mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id as "purchaseId", purchase.user_id as "userId", delivery as "delivery", purchase_date as "purchaseDate", purchase_state as "purchaseState", total_price as "totalPrice" FROM purchase JOIN users ON purchase.user_id = users.user_id WHERE purchase.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT pur.purchase_id as "purchaseId", pur.purchase_date as "purchaseDate", u.user_name as "userName", pur.purchase_state as "purchaseState", pur.total_price as "totalPrice", proi.image_name as "imageName", pro.product_name as "productName", purd.purchase_cnt as "purchaseCnt", pur.delivery as "delivery", u.user_phone as "userPhone" FROM users u, product pro, product_image proi, purchase pur, purchase_detail purd WHERE u.user_id = pur.user_id AND pro.product_id = purd.product_id AND pur.purchase_id = purd.purchase_id AND pro.product_id = proi.product_id AND pur.user_id = #{userId} AND purd.purchase_id = #{purchaseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE (purchase_id, user_id, delivery, purchase_date, purchase_state, total_price) VALUE (#{purchase_id}, #{user_id}, #{delivery_id}, #{purchase_date}, #{purchase_state}, #{total_price}
INSERT INTO PURCHASE_DETAIL (purchase_detail_id, product_id, purchase_id, purchase_cnt) VALUE (#{purchase_detail_id}, #{product_id}, #{purchase_id}, #{purchase_cnt})
